infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: CarDrop uses Bluetooth to detect nearby vehicles and enable proximity-based features.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: CarDrop uses Bluetooth to detect nearby vehicles and enable proximity-based features.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: CarDrop uses your location to show nearby vehicles and events.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: CarDrop uses your location to show nearby vehicles and events.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: CarDrop needs camera access to take photos of your vehicle.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: CarDrop needs photo library access to select vehicle photos.

plugins.photosPermission: CarDrop needs access to your photos to select vehicle images.
plugins.cameraPermission: CarDrop needs camera access to take photos of your vehicle.
